name: Journey to the Core (Adrenalion)
description:
What is Journey to the Core?

Manage your drill and try to reach the core.

Allocate your limited crew to up to 3 sections of your drill at a time.

Tips and controls:
  • Repair your drills hull (cost: 100 resources)
  • Extinguish fires by keeping the affected section activated for some time
  • Keep your heat and oxygen in check
  • Pay attention to incoming obstacles!
Ludum Dare:

This game was made during the 48th Ludum Dare: "Deeper and deeper" in the "Jam" category.

This game is our first entry for a Ludum Dare Game Jam.
